titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to increased funding for the immunizations program under the Public Health Service Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

term.name: Federal aid to child health services

bill.summary: 5/3/2000--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that a specified amount should be appropriated under the Public Health Service Act for FY 2001 to carry out infrastructure and delivery activities for preventive health service programs to immunize, without charge, children, adolescents, and adults against vaccine-preventable diseases.
